meanings.definition: A series of small, closely spaced rectangular blocks used as a decorative element in architecture.
meanings.sent1: The old building had dentils along the roof, adding a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent2: The architect included dentils in the design to give the building a classic look.
meanings.sent3: The dentils on the building seemed to be smiling down at the passersby.
meanings.sent4: The dentils stood out like tiny soldiers guarding the top of the structure.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the dentils on that historic building.

meanings.definition: A row of small, tooth-like projections used in molding or cornices.
meanings.sent1: The intricate molding featured dentils that resembled tiny teeth.
meanings.sent2: The cornice was adorned with delicate dentils that added a unique touch.
meanings.sent3: The dentils on the cornice looked like a row of miniature shark fins.
meanings.sent4: The dentils in the molding gave the room a sense of whimsy and charm.
meanings.sent5: The dentils on the cornice caught the light and sparkled like jewels.
